entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
